Review: Excellent Italian pizzeria! The pizza itself is top-quality - both the dough and the toppings. The staff and service were incredibly friendly; they even went out of their way to make a pizza that wasn't on the menu. Highly recommended!
I ordered from a home.. Really good and the tomato sauce is phenomenal!
Primarily a takeaway place, but they have a couple of tables if you want to eat in. Amazingly good pizzas! This will be my new go to-place now that I live in the neighbourhood!
Soggy raw pizza. Terrible. This place should be shut down
Really a good and tasty pizza done properly… I always go there! … and I am Italian!;) …
Excellent pizza! Nice and quiet terrace outside as well.
Pizza absolutely fantastic. The best. I take the "Burrata e Parma".
The best pizza you can get. It was so delicious. Totally worth it! I loved it

I am from Chicago (Nick and Vito alum) so naturally highly critical of pizza quality. NOI Pizza in Market Hall was amazing, fantastic crust and fresh ingredients. Had the Margherita and Sausage/salami combo, both were amazing!
Absolutely top quality neapolitan pizza at a decent price. Nice atmosphere and sympthetic staff! Mostly for take out at this location.
Great pizza, best quality, authentic taste, and great service! I am so happy to have close to my home now.
Delicious high-quality pizza that taste like they do in Italy :)
The best pizza I have ever eaten up to now we have been eating byrek …
Best
Excellent pizza and quick service!
Best pizza in the town! …
Brilliant and welcome to my neighbourhood
Really great We came because we wanted a good pizza and were just visiting the beach. And we …

The pizzas at this Noi branch are also excellent. I had a Burrata E Parma with a gluten-free base; this gluten-free base tastes and feels like a really good base, in fact one of the better gluten-free pizza bases I've ever tried. It may have been a bit expensive (+40 SEK for the GF base).
Always good pizza, can trust these guys. In my opinion it is probably the best in town, can recommend a burrata e parma with a white base.
We were thrilled with the delicious pizza and the friendly staff. A good vegetarian selection, quick preparation—highly recommended!
Passed by by chance and it just smelled so good we decided to make a spontaneous visit. Their pizza is probably the best I've eaten since I was in Italy!! Wow!
Fantastic pizzas, fast service and super nice. 10/10 well worth a visit
Delicious, authentic Italian pizza. A very cozy and atmospheric place with friendly service. This definitely wasn't my last visit to Noi.
Big difference between this and regular pizza, fast service, got the pizzas in about 5 minutes and well packaged. Was crowded and many there though so they don't get a perfect review

My first visit there, a small place with a few seats inside on barstools with "long tables" along the windows. I was there with a good friend, who recommended this particular pizzeria. Clean and nice inside, friendly and attentive service. …
Very good, nice staff. Has a premium feel compared to the usual bachelorette pizza, a little more expensive but much better so much worth the price for me! …
Terribly good pizza!! Highly recommend we came here by chance and they also served us a whole hour before opening. Fantastic service and fantastic food. Could it be Malmö's best pizza!? …
Fantastically good quality pizzas at the same price as the city's "bad pizzas". I would choose Noi any day of the week if I had the opportunity to pick up.
Awesome Neapolitan pizza with exciting toppings. Superbra does takeaway and in the summer you can sit outside the kiosk and enjoy. However, there is a lack of seating inside.
Here you will meet nice guys who bake the pizza in an instant. It will be a journey around all the taste zones of the tongue. I arrived there hungry and desperate, I left full and happy …

The first time I ordered from there, the Diavola pizza was really good...now it's not on the menu anymore? The Calabrese pizza was sloppy and the bottom kind of fell apart. Maybe Saluhallen is of higher quality? Hope Diavola returns to the menu.
Very good Neapolitan pizza. Soft and easy to digest dough, perfect baking and fine ingredients. Sounds simple but Noi does it in a perfect way and with a service that is 5/5.
Best pizza in Malmö (also gluten free). Awesome quality and really doesn't skimp on ingredients. Don't need any other pizza place than this.
Very friendly staff and good pizzas. Without a doubt the best Neapolitan in Malmö. Will come back many times.
Very good pizzas, we ate Cacciatore and Caprese, both recommended. Nice staff as well.
Absolutely top-notch pizza! I'm a pizza lover, and this is one of the best Neapolitan pizzas I've ever had. Super friendly service.
Bought a Funghi Mist. Very good both dough and filling. Fast friendly service.
Best pizzas...real Italian! Nice staff …
Just as good pizza as at their other locations
